ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate Spews Forth... well, spews anyways
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Kaearia, L40, Karana. ... The L40 song (anti-magic aura) is cancel magic, but generally too slow to be used for this purpose.  Say you re hit with
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, JasonF wrote:

> John, what level is your bard now? For that matter, what's your bard's name
> and server??

Kaearia, L40, Karana.

> > Keep a pumice stone handy.
>
> You mean Disenchanting Melody don't you? ;)

The L40 song (anti-magic aura) is cancel magic, but generally
too slow to be used for this purpose. Say you're hit with
engulfing darkness that slows you to a crawl. You hit
yourself with anti-magic aura, then hit Accelerando. That's
at least 6 seconds for the mob to bash/hit/cast on you. With
a pumice stone, you just start up Accel, use the pumice stone
on yourself, and by this time Accel should kick in and you're
out of there in 3 seconds.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
